main event: Multiple reports of unidentified objects observed in the Ohio area during 1957 and 1960.
interesting points: One report indicated a D-light on the western edge observed to be 30-40 feet in diameter, 2-3 blocks away., Another sighting described a bright light oscillating or flickering for 10 minutes., An unidentified object tracked on radar at an altitude of 4,000-5,000 feet and speed of 240 knots., The visual observations lacked definitive conclusions due to insufficient data., There was mention of the possibility of the observed light being a normal aircraft.
sighted object: A D-light and a bright light in the sky
witness description: The witness observed a D-light and described a bright oscillating light.
